explanation: [0-0] In the shot, a blond man in a red Chicago jersey and ripped jeans sits on a sofa, smiling at the camera. On the table in front of him is a bottle of orange Fanta, a stack of colorful paper cups, a turned-over paper cup next to it, and a white remote control on the right. The table is yellow, the sofa is gray, and there is a yellow pillow. Several colorful stickers are pasted on the white wall behind him. There is a purple circular watermark in the lower right corner.
[0-5] The man picks up the Fanta and pours it over the upside-down paper cup, spilling it on the table, and then carefully flips the cup back over.

Then he turns the cup back over and takes another cup from the side and places it on top of the overturned one.
